string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] You Were Bitten by a Green Mushroom?
#b#@1032104:##k in #b#m101000000##k says she has a favor to ask you.
She wants you to hunt 40 #rGreen Mushrooms#k because she was bitten by one. They can be easily found in #b#m101010102##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1032104:##k in #b#m101000000##k.
You have eliminated 40 #rGreen Mushrooms#k that bit #b#p1032104##k in #b#m101000000##k.

Oh my, let me tell you a story. Something crazy happened to me a few days ago!\nI was inspecting the woods in the forest and something kept circling my feet. I looked down, and it was a #rGreen Mushroom#k!
I was caught off-guard so I screamed, and the monster bit my foot! Look, it's still swollen! Please, please, please do me a favor!

You can probably guess what my favor is.
Eliminate those #rGreen Mushrooms#k that had the audacity to bite my beautiful foot!

I think 40 should do. You 'll find a lot of them in #b#m101010102##k. Go on now, get 'em!
How can you say 'no' to this pretty face?
Tee hee! Did you show them not to mess with me ever again?\nHow dare they even come near my beautiful, perfect feet.
Please step on those #rGreen Mushrooms#k if you ever see them around. Hee hee!
